member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.id
member.summary: Set id of DIV element with the whole treeview inside. Default "tree1".

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.Height
member.summary: String with height value. oTree.Height = "800px" oTree.Height = "100%"

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.Width
member.summary: String with width value. oTree.Width = "200px"

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.Width_ScrollWider
member.summary: String with width if you need to add horizontal scrollbar. Optional Set this property wider than value in property Width. oTree.Width_ScrollWider = "500px"

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.SubTree
member.summary: Set to True only if tree is dynamically loaded into main tree.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.SelectedEnable
member.summary: Set to False to disable script for selecting node.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.ShowIcons
member.summary: When True, image icons will be shown.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.DragAndDropEnable
member.summary: Boolean. Set True if you need Drag-and-Drop.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.SelectedId
member.summary: ID of a node to mark selected on load.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.FolderIcons
member.summary: Path to directory with image icons.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.FolderScript
member.summary: Path to directory with javascript files.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.FolderStyle
member.summary: Path to directory with TreeView style (plus-minus images).

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.DragDisableId
member.summary: List node IDs with commas. These nodes will not be dragged.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.DropDisableId
member.summary: List node IDs with commas. Tree will not drop to these nodes.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.EditNodeEnable
member.summary: Boolean. Set it to true to enable the editing feature for the nodes.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.EditDisableId
member.summary: Disable the editing for specific nodes. oTree.EditDisableId = "id81,id82,id83"

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.KeyNavigationEnable
member.summary: Boolean. Set it to true to enable the keyboard navigation feature for the nodes.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.MultiSelectEnable
member.summary: Boolean. Set to true when you need to select multiple nodes with CTRL+CLICK.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.ExpandSingleEnable
member.summary: Boolean. Set to true when you want only single node to be expanded and other sibling nodes to collapse automatically.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.ShowLost
member.summary: Boolean. Set to True and children without parents will be added to the root by default

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.ShowLostRed
member.summary: Boolean. Set to True to see children nodes added before their parents in red color.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.KeepLastExpanded
member.summary: Used for keeping the state of the treeview.The last expanded nodes will be expanded automatically when the page is visited again.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.KeepLastCollapsed
member.summary: Used for keeping the state of the treeview.The last collapsed nodes will be collapsed automatically when the page is visited again.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.EventList
member.summary: String with event names. These events will be enabled. oTree.EventList = "OnNodeSelect,OnNodeDrop"

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.SelectDisableId
member.summary: List node IDs with commas. These nodes will not be selectable.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.ShowRootPlusMinus
member.summary: Show/hide the +/- button of the Root node.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.ShowRootIcon
member.summary: Show/hide the icon of the Root node.

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.SelectOnCollapse
member.summary: If true, when the parent of the selected node is collapsed, the parent will be automatically selected. Otherwise, the selected node will keep its selected state when its parent is collapsed

member.name: F:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.ShowJSWarning
member.summary: Enable/disable the warning message that is displayed when the JavaScript files of the TreeView are not loaded correctly.

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.AddRootNode(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds only one first root node.
member.param: Text or HTML to display inside the node.
Name of the icon image to be displayed for the node.

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.AddRootNode(System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Adds only one first root node.
member.param: Text or HTML to display inside the node.
When True, node is open on load.
Name of the icon image to be displayed for the node.

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.Add(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a new node
member.param: ID of a parent node.
ID of the node.
Text or HTML to display inside the node.

member.summary: Adds a new node
member.param: ID of a parent node.
ID of the node.
Text or HTML to display inside the node.
When True, node is open on load.

member.summary: Adds a new node
member.param: ID of a parent node.
ID of the node.
Text or HTML to display inside the node.
When True, node is open on load.
Name of the icon image to be displayed for the node.

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.Add(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a new node
member.param: ID of a parent node.
ID of the node.
Text or HTML to display inside the node.
When True, node is open on load.
Name of the icon image to be displayed for the node.
URL to page with tree for loading dynamically (on-demand, on-fly, etc).

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.Add(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a new node
member.param: ID of a parent node.
ID of the node.
Text or HTML to display inside the node.
When True, node is open on load.
Name of the icon image to be displayed for the node.
URL to page with tree for loading dynamically (on-demand, on-fly, etc).
an HashTable is required which may contain additional node data.

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.XML_WriteToFile(System.Object)
member.summary: Write TreeView structure to an XML file
member.param: Absolute physical (not relative!) path to XML file to write TreeView structure to.

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.XML_LoadFromFile(System.Object)
member.summary: Load TreeView structure from an XML file
member.param: Absolute physical (not relative!) path to XML file to load TreeView from.

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.XML_WriteToString
member.summary: Put treeview in XML format to string.
member.returns: returns the TreeView structure in a xml string.

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.XML_LoadFromString(System.Object)
member.summary: Load TreeView from XML string.
member.param: The TreeView structure in a xml string.

member.name: M:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree.HTML
member.summary: Returns the entire TreeView markup. You need to render this markup in the page. Ex. label1.Text=oTree.HTML()
member.returns: a string contains the TreeView markup.

member.name: T:obout_ASPTreeView_2_NET.Tree
member.summary: This library can be used to build a hierarical treeview with unbetable features.
